alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Washington, northwestern Muscatine, southwestern Cedar and southeastern Johnson Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 437 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported dime to nickel size hail near Hills, or 7 miles southeast of Iowa City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Liberty, Hills, Hills Access, and Muscatine County Fairgrounds. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 259 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
